defaultOrganizations.about: The people of Hawaii are one ʻohana. Hawaii Foodbank provides food so that no one in our family goes hungry. We work to gather food and support from our communities. We then distribute food through charitable agencies to those in need. Our mission is from the heart, and we will fulfill our mission with integrity, humanity and aloha.

The Hawaiian Humane Society is dedicated to promoting the human-animal bond and the humane treatment of all animals. We work towards creating a truly humane society based on compassion and shared responsibility. We envision a community in which every companion animal has a home – a community in which people highly regard and care for their own animals and all animals on O’ahu.
The American Red Cross in Hawaii prevents and alleviates human suffering in the face of emergencies by mobilizing the power of volunteers and the generosity of donors.
Together, we create life-changing wishes for children with critical illnesses.

defaultOpportunities.title: Health Help
defaultOpportunities.description: Every single day, Health Help assists people in emergencies. Whether it’s one displaced family, thousands of disaster victims, or providing care and comfort to an ill or injured service member or veteran or support to a military family member, our vital work is made possible by people like you.

defaultOpportunities.title: Beach Cleanup
defaultOpportunities.description: So many people in Hawaii have been taking action on litter and tagging on their own for years or even decades. Still more want to get started, but just don’t know how to begin. We know it is a big step to ignite that enthusiasm and get people engaged in a cause. We support Beach Cleanup Volunteers  by providing supplies, connecting them with other volunteers and helping them organize their own cleanups.

defaultOpportunities.title: Food Drive
defaultOpportunities.description: Now, more than ever, people are facing food insecurity and counting on Food Drive. Schools and businesses are not fully open, many kupuna are still homebound, and many others continue to struggle with drastically altered work schedules as a result of COVID-19. If you’d like to volunteer with us, getting started is as easy as … one, two, three!

defaultOpportunities.title: Virtual Dog Walk
defaultOpportunities.description: Virtual Dog Walk is dedicated to promoting the human-animal bond and the humane treatment of all animals. Mahalo for your interest in joining our volunteer program! When you join the Virtual Dog Walk 'ohana, you’re joining a community of volunteers and staff committed to providing love and support for the pets in our care.
